original: Maybe I can appeal to [From.GetHerHis] greedy side...
translation: 也许我可以求于[From.GetHerHis]贪婪的一面……

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will be pleased if I donate some gold.
Maybe I can bring [From.GetHerHis] [From.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] over to my side.

My agents have brought me a message from [From.GetTitledFirstName], who still refuses my demands that [From.GetSheHe] straighten up! [From.GetSheHeCap] offered to give me a strong eunuch of great martial ability as a gift if I allow [From.GetHerHim] to persist in [From.GetHerHis] decadence.
translation: 我的手下给我带来了一条[From.GetTitledFirstName]的消息，他仍不愿放弃[From.GetSheHe]糜烂的生活方式！[From.GetSheHeCap]提出如果我允许[From.GetHerHim]继续[From.GetHerHis]糜烂生活，[From.GetSheHe]将送给我一个具有杰出军事能力的宦官。

original: I could surely use such a eunuch!
translation: 这样一个阉人肯定有用！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] talked to me about how [From.GetSheHe] has chosen to live [From.GetHerHis] own life. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] tried to explain to me me that what I have viewed as decadence was merely a different way of honoring [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s will. [From.GetSheHeCap] also offered to make a religious donation in my name as a gesture of friendship.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]跟我说[From.GetSheHe]选择了要过[From.GetHerHis]想要的生活。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]试着给我解释我眼中的腐化不过是一种敬仰[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的方式。[From.GetSheHeCap]也提出以我之名进行宗教捐款以示友好。

original: Such a donation would surely please [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName].

[From.GetTitledFirstName] came to my chambers and whispered pretty words in my ear. [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] insists that [From.GetSheHe] ought to be thrown in jail due to [From.GetHerHis] decadent ways, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] now seems to be very different from what I had heard.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]来到了我的宫廷并在我耳边轻语。[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]坚持[From.GetSheHe]得因为[From.GetHerHis]腐化的习性被关进大牢，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]与人们所说的却大不相同。

original: I have fallen in love!
This is clearly just an act!

My spouse is upset about what [From.GetSheHe] refers to as my unnecessarily harsh attitude towards [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetHerHis] decadent ways, and asks me to leave [FromFrom.GetHerHim] alone.
translation: 我的配偶感到气愤，照[From.GetSheHe]的说法我针对[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]和[FromFrom.GetHerHis]腐败的生活没有必要态度恶劣，并要求我不要干预[FromFrom.GetHerHim]。

original: Everything for you, my love.
translation: 你说什么就是什么，亲爱的。

original: My spouse came to me with shocking news. Apparently [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has tried to seduce my beloved [From.GetHusbandWife] and turn [From.GetHerHim] against me.
translation: 我的配偶给我带来了个惊喜。似乎[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]尝试勾引我的[From.GetHusbandWife]并利用[From.GetHerHim]对付我。

original: It became clear to me when hearing about [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s decadent ways that the right place to kill [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is in [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] own palace...
translation: 听说[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的生活荒淫无度，在[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]宫廷里干掉[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]应该是最好的选择……

original: My co-conspirators will bribe [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] servants to aid us.
I will bribe [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] servants to assist us.
I will replace [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] servants with my own.
All of a sudden, I realized that such decadent fools surely are the most vulnerable in their own palace.
translation: 一时间，我明白了这种腐化糜烂的傻瓜在自己的宫殿里最掉以轻心。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has sent me the necessary funds to bribe [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s servants to join our cause.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]给了我足够的钱去贿赂[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的侍从加入我们。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has refused to give me the necessary funds for bribes to have [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] killed in his own palace.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]拒绝给我必须的贿赂以便杀了[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]。

original: How wonderful it is to just sit at home and enjoy the 'simple' things in life. Servants, more wine please! More food too for that matter!
translation: 啊在家享用「节俭」的生活真好。来人，上酒！加菜！

original: [This.GetTitledName] will no longer be a stain on my dynasty!
That's right, do hurry!
Why is my servant running towards me?
translation: 诶，为什么我的侍从向我冲过来？

original: A hidden dagger held by my own servant, is this really how I must die? [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] forgive me, for I have sinned...
translation: 我自己的侍从抽出一把藏好的匕首，我就要这样死了么？[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，原谅我这个罪人……

original: Death to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]!
Why? Who? [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]...

I was sitting comfortably along with my beautiful servants, enjoying a cup of expensive wine after a grand dinner, when suddenly I saw one of my servants dashing towards me with a dagger in her hand. I jumped away just in time and my guards caught her before she had the time to strike again. Before she was taken care of, she uttered the name of the one behind the plan.
translation: 我舒服的坐着，左拥右抱美丽的侍者，大餐之后正拿美酒消食，突然间其中一个侍从举着匕首扑过来。说时迟那时快，我一下跳开，让守卫们把她拿下。经过一番折腾，她吐露出了幕后黑手。

original: Damn you, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]!

I was sitting comfortably along with my beautiful servants, enjoying a cup of expensive wine after a grand dinner, when suddenly I saw one of my servants dashing towards me with a dagger in her hand. I jumped away just in time and my guards caught her before she had the time to strike again. She has been taken care of now, but I fear she was only a pawn. Who was behind this plan?
translation: 我舒服的坐着，左拥右抱美丽的侍者，大餐之后正拿美酒消食，突然间其中一个侍从举着匕首扑过来。说时迟那时快，我一下跳开，让守卫们把她拿下。她不再是威胁了，但恐怕也只是一颗弃子，还不知道是谁在幕后。

original: I fear I shall never know.

My co-conspirator, [From.GetTitledName], has let me know that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will die in [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] own palace, with a dagger taken to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] throat by [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] own servants.
translation: 我的同谋，[From.GetTitledName]，告知我[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]将死在[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]宫殿，而割开[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]喉咙的会是[Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]自己侍从的匕首。

original: This is what decadence brings you!

[From.GetTitledName] approves of my idea to have [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] killed by [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] own servants. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will surely forgive me due to [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s decadent ways.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]同意我用[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName][From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]自己的侍从谋害他的主意。[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]定当认可我清理[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]腐化的罪恶。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. Several of [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] servants are loyal to our cause and we will be ready to strike in one month's time.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]通知我刺杀[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]的计划正按部就班进行中。几个[From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]侍从忠于我们的事业，准备在一个月之后执行计划。

original: Success! [From.GetTitledName] died. Unfortunately, my complicity was discovered.
translation: 成功！[From.GetTitledName]死了。不幸的是我的参与也被发觉。

original: Good. But... bad.
Success! [From.GetTitledName] died not knowing the name of [From.GetPossPronoun] killer. The bribed servants have been taken care of and will not speak of what happened this day.
translation: 成功！[From.GetTitledName]死了也不知道[From.GetPossPronoun]杀手的名字。受贿的侍从已经被关照，不可能再提及当日发生之事。

original: I shall celebrate this... modestly.
translation: 我应当为此小小的庆祝一下……

original: Failure! [From.GetTitledName] overheard our servants talking and uncovered our plot to kill [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 完蛋了！[From.GetTitledName]听到了我们的同谋讨论谋杀[From.GetHerHim]之事。

original: This is bad.
Failure! [From.GetTitledName] realized something was off and had the servants taken away. However, he was unable to uncover our plot.
translation: 完蛋了！[From.GetTitledName]发觉了事情不对，调走了侍从。不过他也无从知晓计划细节。

original: Designated Regent
This character will become the Regent if one is needed.
translation: 必要时，这个角色会成为摄政

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must be a neighbor or the De Jure liege of my Capital
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须与我接壤，或者是我首都的法理领主

original: In the game, you can play as any medieval ruler at any point in time, from a lowly count to a great emperor. When your character dies, you will need an heir to take over, and so on, down the ages. Unlike most other games, the starting situation is historical - and thus completely unbalanced. Check the estimated difficulty of a ruler before you start playing!
translation: 在本游戏中，您可以扮演任何中世纪时期的统治者，下至伯爵，上至帝王。当您的角色去世时，您需要有一个继承人接任，如此流传，经久不断。与其他游戏不同，本游戏开始时的状况是符合历史的，也就是完全没有平衡一说。请先查看为您的角色估算的难度再选择进入游戏！

original: High Chief
High Chieftess
High Chiefdom of
Jarldom of
Farin
Farina
Farbas
Farba
Mansa
Taishi
Taishi of
The people in the county of [Root.GetName] have assimilated new customs from afar, blending them with old Slavic traditions. They have also taken to calling themselves 'Rus' or 'Russians'.
translation: 在以前的斯拉夫传统基础上，[Root.GetName]的人民吸收了远方的新习俗。他们现在自称「罗斯人」或「俄罗斯人」。

original: New, but still recognizable.
translation: 有新事物，但是还能识别出旧传统。

original: Embrace Russian Culture
Many of our subjects are adopting new ways and traditions brought in by foreigners, integrating them with local customs. Perhaps we should do the same...
translation: 我们子民中的许多人正在接受外国人带来的新的生活方式和传统，他们正在融入本地的风俗习惯。也许我们也应该这样做……

original: You grow weary of spending so much time in your castle, performing tedious duties of government and diplomacy. Meanwhile, [From.GetTitledFirstName] keeps telling you of all the interesting adventures he experiences in your service. But perhaps you could join him next time he rides out...
translation: 你长久以来在城堡内照料政事外交，心力交瘁。与此同时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]不断的诉说着在你麾下时的各种奇妙旅途。也许下次他来了我可以跟他一起去走走……

original: Yes, I think I will!
No, I must tend to my duties as [Root.GetTitle].
translation: 不，作为[Root.GetTitle]的责任不可懈怠。

original: You ride out one fine morning in the company of [From.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick], taking no escort and wearing practical rather than regal attire. This will be a good break from the monotony of your court. You catch [From.GetTitledFirstName] giving you a sceptical look, but you are sure this will be a fine journey.
translation: 在一个美妙的早晨，你同[From.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]一同骑行，没有带任何护卫并身着便服。这是场与朝廷单调生活不同的体验。你感到[From.GetTitledFirstName]以怀疑的目光看着你，但自信这会是场愉快的旅途。

original: What could possibly go wrong?
Yatvingia
Pecheneg
Seljuk Empire
Settle Tribe
Assign your [GetMyTreasurerName] to settle members of your tribe in the county, increasing the chance that its culture will change to §Y[Culture.GetName]§!.
translation: 指派你的[GetMyTreasurerName]将部落成员安顿在省份中，增加本地文化变成§Y[Culture.GetName]§!的几率。

original: Tribe Settled
My efforts to settle our tribe in [Root.Location.GetName] have met with success! My liege will be pleased!
translation: 将部落安顿在[Root.Location.GetName]的努力没有白费！我的领主会高兴的！

original: [Root.Liege.Culture.GetName] ways are superior.

My [Root.GetMyTreasurerName], [From.GetTitledFirstName], is pleased to report that [From.Location.GetName] has been settled with many good [Root.Culture.GetName] families. The locals, though initially resistant, have started to adopt our language and customs!
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，激动地通知说[From.Location.GetName]安顿了许多[Root.Culture.GetName]家庭。本地人最初有些抵制，但仍接受了我们的语言和风俗！

original: [From.GetFirstName] is always reliable.
[Root.GetMyTreasurerName] Wounded

The locals in [Root.Location.GetName], angered by the increasing numbers of [Root.Liege.Culture.GetName] settlers, stormed my house and almost killed me! I took a wound in the shoulder fighting for my life!
translation: [Root.Location.GetName]的本地人，因越来越多的[Root.Liege.Culture.GetName]人定居感到愤怒，差点杀了我！我伤到了肩膀但还是逃出来了。

original: I can't say I blame them...
My [Root.GetMyTreasurerName], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has been stabbed and wounded by the locals in [From.Location.GetName], who are fiercely resisting our settlers.
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，被[From.Location.GetName]本地人抵制外来定居者的过程中伤到了。

original: Such is to be expected...
Build Legend
Warriors Raised
My efforts at building the legend of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have met with great success. Bands of warriors has converged at [Root.Location.Capital.GetName] lusting for plunder and glory!
translation: 我在[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]歌颂传奇事迹取得了巨大成效。一股勇士前来[Root.Location.Capital.GetName]准备投身伟大事业！

original: My [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] will be pleased!

My [Root.GetMyTreasurerName], [From.GetTitledFirstName], tells me that [From.GetPossPronoun] efforts at praising my name and deeds have met with great success! A small army of warriors have converged at [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] ready to serve me. I just need to make sure they have someone to fight - within a year - lest they become... troublesome.
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，告诉我[From.GetPossPronoun]宣传我的功绩的努力没有白费！一小股勇士前来[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]为我作战。我只需要在近期提供给他们这样的机会，不然事情就麻烦了……

original: Splendid!
The warriors my [Root.GetMyTreasurerName] raised to fight for my glory have become disillusioned by my effeminate pacifism and have gone home in disgust, causing me a great loss of face.
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName]招募准备好为我作战的勇士对我和平主义的行为感到失望回家，丢尽了我的脸。

original: Curse them!
Build Zeal
Zealots Raised

I have managed to whip up the religious fervor in [Root.Location.GetName] to a frenzy. Zealous warriors have gathered in the name of [Root.Liege.Religion.GetRandomGodName] to bring ruin to the infidels!
translation: 我成功地在[Root.Location.GetName]的人民中注入了宗教的狂热。[Root.Liege.Religion.GetRandomGodName]虔诚的勇士随时准备好对抗异教徒！

original: My [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] will be pleased!

My [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName], [From.GetTitledFirstName], tells me that [From.GetPossPronoun] efforts at increasing religious fervor among the people have met with great success! A small army of zealots have converged at [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] ready to serve me. Now I simply need to attack some suitable infidel before my new recruits wander off in disgust.
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉了我 [From.GetPossPronoun]努力获得了巨大的成功！人们的宗教热情被鼓动了起来。一小队狂热的战士已经聚集在了[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]准备为我效命。现在我只需要去找些异教徒让他们发泄，不然这些士兵就会兴尽散去。

original: Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!

The holy warriors my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] attracted to fight for [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] have become disillusioned by my ungodly refusal to fight a Holy War and wandered off, damaging my Piety greatly.
translation: [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]虔诚的勇士前来为[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]作战。但我拒绝发起圣战的行为让他们鄙夷，纷纷散去。我的虔诚受到了极大损害。

original: Whatever happened to Patience!?
Organize Raid
Raid Organized
With enticing words of riches beyond measure, I have gathered up a mighty host in [Root.Location.GetName]. These men do not like to sit idle though...
translation: 我用无量财富的花言巧语，在[Root.Location.GetName]聚集了一股强大的军团。这些人不会在这干等着的……

original: My [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] will be pleased!

My [Root.GetMyMarshalName], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has gathered up a great host of raiders, lusting for plunder and wanton destruction. I must use these men and not allow them to sit idle for too long!
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyMarshalName]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，组织了许多参与劫掠的勇士，他们期待着荣耀，财富与烧杀抢掠。我不能让这些好汉等的太久！

original: Great news indeed!

The raiding party my [Root.GetMyMarshalName] gathered up to fight for me have grown tired of my effeminate pacifism and gone home to their wives, but not before picking up everything they could find of value!
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyMarshalName]组织的劫掠团本该是聚集起来为我作战。但长久的和平使得他们厌倦，回去陪家人了。回去之前还顺走了许多财富物资！

original: Thieves! Uh, well...

[From.GetTitledName] [From.GetDeathReason] on [GetDateText]. [From.GetPossPronounCap] [GetFromReverseRelation], [Root.GetFirstName], succeeded to the throne of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] with a grand ceremony in [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName].

On [GetDateText], [From.GetTitledName] [From.GetDeathReason]. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] was succeeded by [From.GetPossPronoun] [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] [GetFromReverseRelation] [Root.GetFirstName].

[From.GetTitledName] [From.GetDeathReason] on [GetDateText]. [From.GetPossPronounCap] [Root.Culture.GetName] [GetFromReverseRelation] [Root.GetFirstName] succeeded to the throne of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] as [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

[From.GetTitledName] [From.GetDeathReason] on [GetDateText]. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] was succeeded to the throne of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] by [From.GetPossPronoun] [Root.Culture.GetName] [GetFromReverseRelation] [Root.GetFirstName], a committed [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetGroupName].
Israelite
Mazdan
This Casus Belli allows you to destroy all of §Y$TARGET$§!'s Trade Posts in your entire Realm.
translation: 这个宣战理由准许你摧毁所有§Y$TARGET$§!在你国内的贸易站。

original: Emperors can grant kingdoms or duchies to vassals as Viceroyalties. Such grants are not inherited and will revert back to the emperor when the Viceroy dies - a handy way of staying below your Vassal Limit.
translation: 皇帝可以将王国和公国头衔以总督形式冠以封臣。通过这样获取的头衔不能被后代继承，而是在总督死后回归皇帝手中——此法能有效控制不超出封臣上限。

original: Castrated Close Kin
Blinded Close Kin
Neither temporary title holders nor their vassals can usurp any titles
translation: 临时头衔所有者及其封臣都不能篡夺头衔。

original: You will play as a succession of characters from the same Dynasty, down the ages. In this Learning Scenario, you will be safe from attack and internal strife until your ruler turns 40 years old. When this happens, [Root.GetFirstName] will die (normally though, characters die of old age, disease or violence) and the Learning Scenario will end. When [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] dies, you can keep playing a normal game as [Root.GetPossPronoun] Heir. Feel free to navigate through the game as you wish, but note that if you do not follow the Learning Scenario instructions you might miss out on further help.
translation: 您将扮演同一家族内的继任者，不断延续血脉。在教学战役中，直到您的君主40岁前，国内外都会十分安定。到那时候，[Root.GetFirstName]会死去（通常来说角色会死于高龄、疾病或是暴力）而教学战役会结束。在[Root.GetSubjectPronoun]去世后，您可以扮演[Root.GetPossPronoun]继承人继续游戏。请随意尝试游戏中的各个部分，但请注意，如果不按照教学来玩，可能会错过一些帮助提示。

original: It appears you don't have enough ships to transport the Army. Sometimes when you're at War, the Levies from your Demesne and your Vassals might not be enough. In these cases it is wise to hire Mercenaries. This can be done via the Mercenaries Tab in the Military View. Newly hired Mercenaries arrive in your capital County. They are very expensive, both to hire and maintain. Take a look at the mercenary composition before you hire them. Some are made entirely out of Armies while others consist only of Fleets. Hire some naval mercs! They will spawn in a Sea Area West of your Realm.
translation: 看来你没有足够的船来运送部队。有时候在战时，你和你封臣领地的兵员可能不够。这时候最好利用雇佣兵。可以通过选择军事界面的雇佣兵选项招募帮手。新近招募的雇佣兵会出现在你的首都。他们不仅雇佣起来十分昂贵，维持雇佣也不便宜。雇佣前仔细看看兵团的组成。有些雇佣兵全是海军而有些没有船只。这里雇一些海军雇佣兵。他们会在你国度西方的海上出现。

original: [Prev.GetTitledName] supported [From.GetTitledName] in war against [From.GetHerHis] enemies.
[From.GetTitledName] supported [Prev.GetTitledName] in war against [Prev.GetHerHis] enemies.
The [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] ended as the [From.Religion.GetName] no longer have a Religious Head.
Divorcing §Y[Actor.Spouse.GetFirstName]§W will cost you §R$COST$§W Prestige.
translation: 与§Y[Actor.Spouse.GetFirstName]§W离婚会让你损失 §R$COST$§W 威望。

original: The divorce will also cost you §R$COST$§W prestige.
translation: 离婚会让你损失 §R$COST$§W 威望。

original: Born in Cairo, Al-Mustansir became Caliph when he was only 6 years old. During his early years, his mother Ma'd Abu Tamim acted as regent and saw to her son's safety. Once he became an adult, his reign was dominated by strong Viziers, and also plagued by chaos as famine weakened the realm and powerful groups of Turkish mercenaries dominated Egypt and struggled for power. Al-Mustansir never fully took the reins of power, but he was to become the longest-reigning Caliph in history.
translation: 穆斯坦绥尔生于开罗，在6岁时成为了哈里发。早年，他的母亲阿布·塔明作为摄政维护她儿子的安全。到成年时，他在一群强力的维齐尔簇拥下统治。他的时代充斥着混乱和饥荒，嬴弱的国度成为多个突厥大佣兵团的目标。穆斯坦绥尔从未完全掌握实权，但他仍旧是历史上在位最长的哈里发。

original: Alp Arslan, great-grandson of Seljuk, was born Muhammad bin Dawud Chaghri, but his strength, personal combat skills and valor were soon to earn him his honorary name, which means 'Heroic Lion'. Early on, he succeeded his father as governor of Khorasan, and after a succession crisis in 1064 he took the title of Sultan by force of arms, and became ruler of the immense Seljuk Empire. He then made war on the Byzantine Empire, defeating them thoroughly at the famous battle of Manzikert and taking the Emperor prisoner. This victory was a first step towards Turkish domination in Anatolia and was one of the major events triggering the crusades. He died true to his name, at the age of 42, refusing to let his guards help him against a rebel prisoner who came at him with a dagger.
translation: 阿尔普·阿尔斯兰，塞尔柱的曾孙，出生时叫穆罕穆德·本·达乌德·察合里。但他因他的强大，优秀的作战技巧和勇气而得此名号，意为「英勇的狮子」。早年，他继承了父亲成为呼罗珊的统领。在1064年继承危机时他通过武力取得了苏丹的名号，后来统治了广袤的塞尔柱帝国。他对拜占庭帝国发起战争并在曼齐刻尔特战役里彻底击败了他们，捕获了拜占庭皇帝。这场胜利铺垫了日后突厥人在安纳托利亚的崛起，也是触发十字军远征的原因之一。他42岁时因拒绝卫兵帮助他对付一个持匕首袭击他的叛军囚犯而死，死也未辱其名。

original: As king of Castile and Leon, Ferdinand was one of the most critical figures in the history of the Reconquista that would eventually see the Muslims driven from Iberia. Castile under Ferdinand expanded far into southern Spain, using a combination of force and diplomacy to seize Andalusian cities such as Córdoba and Seville. More than four hundred years after his death, Ferdinand was canonized by Pope Clement X and came to be known as as Ferdinand the Saint in the annals of history.
translation: 作为卡斯蒂利亚和莱昂的国王，斐迪南是收复失地运动中最重要的一个人物，他最终将穆斯林从伊比利亚赶了出去。卡斯蒂利亚在斐迪南的统治下扩张至西班牙南部，他恩威并举，征服了包括科尔多瓦和塞维利亚在内的安达卢西亚城市。斐迪南在死后四百年被教宗克莱芒十世勘定为圣人，纳入史册。

original: The Hanseatic League was a loose alliance of German cities centered on Lübeck that dominated Baltic trade in the late Middle Ages and beyond, after displacing Visby as the leading merchant power in the region. Offices, so-called 'kontors,' were opened in major ports and trading hubs everywhere from London in the west to Novgorod in the east. Eventually the League became powerful enough to challenge larger realms directly, such as when they sacked the Danish capital of Copenhagen in the second half of the 14th century.
translation: 汉萨同盟是由一群由吕贝克主导的德意志城市所组成，取代维斯比成为在中世纪以及后来时代主导波罗的海贸易的商业力量。他们的办事处，「孔托」，遍布主要的贸易港口和城市，西至伦敦，东至诺夫哥罗德。最终联盟强大到了能直接挑战大国，一个例子便是在十四世纪，他们占领和洗劫了丹麦首都哥本哈根。

original: Referred to by contemporaries as stupor mundi, the 'wonder of the world,' Friedrich II was among the most powerful and influential emperors of the Holy Roman Empire during the Middle Ages. His reign was marked with frequent wars against the Papacy, and Friedrich was excommunicated four times - Pope Gregory IX even dubbed him the Antichrist. He managed to broker the return of Jerusalem to Christian control during the Sixth Crusade despite taking part in very little actual fighting. After dying of dysentry in 1250 at the age of 55, his line would quickly die out, resulting in the end of the House of Hohenstaufen.
translation: 腓特烈二世是神圣罗马帝国在中世纪最强大的皇帝之一，被同时代的人称为stupor mundi，「世间奇迹」。他的统治常常伴随着与教廷的战争，腓特烈二世被绝罚过四次——教宗额我略九世甚至指认他为敌基督。尽管他在第六次十字军运动中只参与了少许实际战斗，但成功商定了让耶路撒冷重归基督徒控制。1250年，55岁的他死于痢疾，他的血脉迅速凋亡，最终为霍亨斯陶芬王朝画上了句号。

original: Singhana II was a powerful Indian ruler who greatly expanded his realm towards the north, south and east. As a great patron of science and the arts, he established a college of astronomy and founded the city of Singhanapur.
translation: 僧诃那二世作为一个强大的印度君主，把他的国度向东、北、南大幅地扩张。作为科学和艺术的拥护者，他在僧诃那城建立了天文学院。

original: Edward III was in many ways a warrior king, who was crowned after the disastrous reign of his father came to an end in 1327. Under Edward, England was transformed into one of most formidable military powers in Europe and his claim to the French throne would begin the conflict that eventually became known as the Hundred Years War. During his long reign, which would go on to last fifty years, Edward focused mostly on military matters. He personally oversaw the decisive Battle of Crécy, where an English army consisting mostly of longbowmen defeated a much larger French force.
translation: 爱德华三世从许多方面来说都是一个勇士。1327年，其父天灾般的统治终结后他接过了王冠。在爱德华领导下，英格兰跻身欧洲军事强国之列，而他对法国王位的宣称，则最终引发了后世所称的百年战争。他的统治长达五十年，爱德华始终关注军事。他亲自指挥决定性的克雷西会战，利用主要由长弓手构成的英格兰军队击败了兵力大幅占优的法国军队。

original: Philippe the Fortunate was the first French king to hail from the House of Valois, and under his reign France would see the beginning of the Hundred Years War. Despite Philippe's nickname, the war did not go well, and the French army was virtually annihilated at the hands of the English during the Battle of Crécy. At the end of his reign the Black Death made its first appearance in France. A full third of the subjects in his kingdom succumbed to this plague - including Philippe's wife, Queen Joan.
translation: 腓力六世是来自瓦卢瓦王朝的第一个法国国王。在他的统治下，法国人迎来了后世所称的百年战争。虽然被叫做幸运的菲利普，但历史上的他并没有什么好运气。在克雷西会战时，法国的军队几乎全数被英格兰人歼灭。在他统治的晚期，黑死病第一次出现在了法国。全国三分之一的人口染上了这致命的疫病，包括腓力六世的王后琼。

original: Son of Osman I, the founder and namesake of the illustrious Ottoman dynasty, Orhan succeeded his father upon his death. He initially offered to rule jointly with his brother Alaeddin, but the latter declined and would instead serve as Orhan's highly influential vizier until his death in 1332. Under Orhan, the Ottomans expanded greatly in northwestern Anatolia at the expense of the Byzantine Empire, who were embroiled in a series of civil wars.
translation: 奥尔汗，作为光辉的奥斯曼王朝奠基者奥斯曼一世之子，在父亲死后继承父业。他最初提出与其兄弟阿拉丁共治，但阿拉丁拒绝，最终成为了奥尔汗手下的大维奇尔，直到他于 1332 年去世。在奥尔汗治下，奥斯曼乘拜占庭帝国苦于内战时在安纳托利亚西北大幅扩张。

original: Mohammed Özbeg was the longest reigning khan of the Golden Horde, and it was under him that the Mongol splinter state reached the height of its power. Özbeg was converted to Islam at an early age, and upon assuming the throne he adopted it as a state religion. Despite this he was known to be highly tolerant of Christians, something that Pope John XXII would personally thank him for in a letter.
translation: 穆罕默德·月即别是金帐汗国在位时间最长的可汗，在他的治理下蒙古各国达到了权利的巅峰。早年月即别皈依了伊斯兰教，在他即位后他钦点伊斯兰教为国教。月即别还有容纳基督徒的美名，教宗若望十二世甚至给他写过亲笔信表达感谢。

original: Muhammad II was the head of the Tughluq dynasty, which had carved out a vast Muslim empire in India. Under him, the empire initially expanded to temporarily control most of India, but it was not to last. Muhammad had a well-earned reputation for ruthlessness and cruelty, and taxes in his empire were raised to exorbitant levels. He had to contend with numerous revolts, and by the time of his death the realm had already begun to fragment.
translation: 穆罕默德二世是图格鲁克族长，他在印度建立了一个广大的穆斯林帝国。在他的统治下，帝国起初暂时扩张到了印度的大部分地区，但并未长久维持下去。穆罕默德以冷酷无情出名，他对帝国课以重税。运作帝国的同时他还面临无数叛乱的挑战，当他死时，帝国几近分崩离析。

original:
Each era will offer you different challenges and a different flavor. Here are some of the highlights of each:
- Early Middle Ages: Carolingian Empire, Picts, the first Viking raids, founding of the Holy Roman Empire, Byzantine Iconoclasm.
- Viking Age: Viking realms, Jewish Khazars, Carolingian successor kingdoms, Umayyads and Rashtrakutas.
- High Middle Ages: William the Conqueror, Seljuk Turks, Kievan Rus, splintered realms in Spain and Rajastan. Latest start with a strong Byzantium.
- Age of the Mongols: Golden Horde, Ilkhanate, Muslim Ghulams in India.
- Late Middle Ages: Hundred Years War, Ottomans, Lithuania, Mongol Khanates, Tughluq Dynasty, Christian Spain.
translation:
每一个时代都有其特点和挑战。以下是每个时代的一些有趣之处：
－中世纪早期：加洛林帝国，皮克特人，最早的维京劫掠，建立神圣罗马帝国和拜占庭的圣像破坏运动。
－维京时代：维京人国度，犹太教可萨人，加洛林继承者们的王国，伍麦叶和罗湿陀罗拘陀。
－中世纪盛期：征服者威廉，塞尔柱突厥人，基辅罗斯，分裂的西班牙和罗阇萨傥那，强大的拜占庭的最后时代。
－蒙古时代：金帐汗国，伊儿汗国，印度的穆斯林古拉姆。
－中世纪晚期：百年战争，奥斯曼，立陶宛，蒙古汗国，图格鲁克王朝，基督教统治的西班牙。

original: Abandon Heresy
Raise Tribal Army

I can summon an army of true and steadfast [Root.Culture.GetName] warriors to fight in the war. They will surely come, as my Prestige and Influence in these lands are great, but once peace ensues they will return to their homes. They fight mainly for honor, but I will need to pay for their food and other provisions.
translation: 我可以召集忠诚的[Root.Culture.GetName]勇士以助战事。我的名声在外，影响广泛。他们定会前来。但是一旦和平到来，他们便会回归故里。虽然他们主要是为荣誉而非财富作战，但我仍需为他们支付补给。

original: Hired Event Army Maintenance
Hired Event Navy Maintenance
Mercenary Maintenance: §Y$MERC$§!\nEvent Troop Maintenance: §Y$EVENT$§!
translation: 雇佣兵维护费：§Y$MERC$§!\n事件军队维护费：§Y$EVENT$§!

original: Monthly Maintenance: §R$COST$§!¤
A §Y$NUM_TROOPS$§!-men regiment arrives in §Y$WHERE$§!
translation: 一支 §Y$NUM_TROOPS$§! 人的军团已经抵达§Y$WHERE$§!。

original: §Y$NUM_SHIPS$§! ships arrive in §Y$WHERE$§!.
the Hunchback

Your son Pepin is illegitimate, but perhaps he could grow into a man worthy of ruling the Franks? His body is twisted and he looks frail, but a boy that overcomes such unfair punishments in life could perhaps with time become an even stronger ruler?
translation: 丕平虽是你的私生子，可说不定他会长成法兰克人称职的统治者呢？他的身体嬴弱扭曲，但上天劳其筋骨苦其心志，或许正注定了降大任于他？

original: I will legitimize him!
translation: 让他成为我合法的儿子！

original: I think not.
Leave them alone for now.
The death of [From.GetFirstName]
Tribal lands of
The Lombard Princess

My Lord, the power of your enemies are growing steadily, and while your vassals are surely loyal beyond doubt, it would perhaps be prudent to look for alliances outside the Frankish realm. If you would marry a daughter of the Lombard King, you could gain a powerful ally if things threaten to get out of hand due your brother's devious machinations.
translation: 陛下，您敌人的实力与日俱增，即便您的封臣各个忠心不二，但在法兰克人国度之外寻求盟友也是良谋。如果您愿意，迎娶伦巴第国王诸多女儿之一，定可实力大增，以便对抗您弟弟的诡计。

original: Yes, this will be a good marriage.
No Lombards in my bed!
translation: 我才不要让伦巴第人上我床呢！

original: The Lombard Queen

My Lord, there is a lot of grumbling among the lords of the realm. While it is understood that your marriage to [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has great political utility, it is hard for many to accept that you have married a princess from the realm of our age-old enemies the Lombards. It has reached the point where you may even be losing the support of some nobles. But perhaps it is still not too late to rectify the situation...
translation: 陛下，不少臣属对此不满。迎娶 [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]自然在政治上有其作用，但娶一个来自伦巴第——我们旧敌的公主对很多人来说难以接受。如今这种不满已经可能导致您失去一些贵族的支持。现在休了她还为时不晚……

original: I knew this was a bad idea. I'll renounce her.
translation: 我就知道这是个馊主意，休了她！

original: She is their Queen now. They must learn to accept it.
translation: 她现在是我的王后，也是他们的王后，他们得学会接受现实。

original: [From.GetDynName], the wife of the recently deceased [FromFrom.GetTitledName], has arrived at your gates, asking for refuge for herself and her offspring. She claims that her late husband's evil brother murdered him in cold blood in order to take control of the realm for himself, and now she fears for her life as well.
translation: [From.GetDynName]，死去不久的[FromFrom.GetTitledName]的遗孀，来到你门前，乞求给予她与她孩子保护。她声称她亡夫险恶的兄弟会毫不留情的谋杀她们，以取得对国度的控制。

original: You shall be welcome here.
I am sorry, this does not concern me.
Word reaches you that [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]'s wife [FromFrom.GetDynName] has received refuge at the court of [From.GetTitledName]. Surely, there is a plot against you brewing here...
translation: 你听说[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]的妻子[FromFrom.GetDynName]前往[From.GetTitledName]的朝廷求得保护。这肯定是在酝酿什么阴谋……

original: This will not go unpunished.
Your soldiers have brought [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]'s family before you. [FromFrom.GetDynName] falls to her knees, begging you for mercy.
translation: 你的士兵押来了[FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]的家人。[FromFrom.GetDynName]跪在你面前，乞求宽恕。

original: Lock them up in houses of God.
They must die, there is no other way.

[From.GetDynName] has appeared at your gate, begging for protecton. They are destitute and alone, woman and child. She speaks weakly and nervously: 'My Lord, I have nothing left and I throw myself at your feet and put faith in your mercy. Remember that it is not I but your brother that was your enemy'.
translation: [From.GetDynName]来到你门前，请求保护。他们无依无靠，只有女人和孩子。她颤抖的求你：「我的好陛下，我一无所有，只希望您能给予仁慈。我并非是您的敌人，您的兄弟才是啊。」

original: To the convent with you.
Snake-spawn must be killed ere they bite.
translation: 妖孽，今日不处，必留后患。

original: My brother's keeper

Your mother comes to see you. 'My son, your brother's plotting against you is dangerous. I know you love him as dearly as I do, but something must be done. With your permission, I shall go see him and do what is needed to resolve this conflict. He must not come in the way of you fulfilling your destiny as ruler of all the Franks, but I fear a bloody war. Trust me, it will be better like this.'\n\nYou look thoughtfully at your mother, trying to read her mind. There is an odd look of determination in her eyes.
translation: 你的母亲前来见你。「儿子，你兄弟密谋针对你，危害你。我知道你爱他如我爱他一般，但不能继续这样。如果你同意，我会去见他，调解纷争。他定不能阻碍你成为法兰克人的王，但我怕一场血战在所难免。相信我，这样更好。」\n\n你仔细打量着你母亲，尝试明白她真正的意图。她眼中充满果决。

original: Yes, Mother. Go and sort this out.
There is no point.
Your mother Bertrada has arrived at the gate. She travels with a but a small escort and she is asking to see you. Shall we let her in?
translation: 你的母亲贝尔特拉达一行来到门前。她只带了几个随从，要求来见你。让她进来吗？

original: Yes, let her in.
I have nothing to say to that woman.
translation: 我对她没有什么好说的。

original: Mother and son

As you dine with your mother that night, she speaks with you of your youth and of her great love for you: 'I know it pains you that I support your brother, but please let us speak of happier days. I would like to forget for a moment these troublesome times and spend the evening with you in intimacy and friendship. We can dine and reminisce, and you shall be my beloved son as always. Here, i brought some excellent wine for you to drink while we talk of old times.'
translation: 你与你母亲共进晚餐，她提到你年轻的时候以及她有多爱你：「我知道我支持你哥哥让你难受，但现在让我们来说点开心事。让我们忘记时下不快，把对方当作亲近的朋友。让我们一边吃一边回忆当年你小的时候，你是我最爱的儿子。来，我给你带了上好的酒，一边喝一边聊。」

original: Ah, wine... good!
I don't trust you, mother. Please leave.

Your mother left early this morning, before you woke. It was strange to see her again like that. You have a strange, slow pain in your stomach as well, and you feel rather weak. Maybe it's something you ate or drank.
translation: 清晨，你母亲在你醒来前就早早离去。她表现的有点奇怪。你感到腹部疼痛，身体虚弱。是不是因为吃了或喝了什么不好的？

original: Something is wrong...

The Early Middle Ages started with the fall of the Western Roman Empire in the early 5th century. The earlier part of this era saw the great Germanic and Slavic migrations across Europe, with peoples such as the Goths and Lombards settling in Southern Europe, the Franks settling in Gaul and Saxons crossing the sea and settling in Britain. The Eastern Roman Empire was violently shaken by the pressure from the Goths and Avars, and fought bitterly with the ancient Persian enemy. The rise of Islam saw the Arabs conquering immense amounts of territory in the Middle East and North Africa, and in India several great dynasties vied for dominance, with the Rashtrakutas rising towards the end of the 8th century. In the steppes, the Khazars grew in power, and in Scandinavia things were about to change in a way that was to affect the entire continent...
translation: 中世纪早期始于五世纪西罗马的毁灭。这一时期早期伴随着日耳曼和斯拉夫民族跨越欧洲的迁徙。这些民族里包括在南欧定居的哥特人和伦巴第人、在高卢定居的法兰克人、渡海占领不列颠的萨克森人。与此同时，东罗马受到哥特人与阿瓦尔人的威胁，又与古老的波斯敌人苦战。伊斯兰教的崛起让阿拉伯人横扫中东与北非、征服大量的土地。而在东方的印度，数个大王朝为了曲女城的支配权展开了激烈的竞争，其中包括八世纪末崛起的罗湿陀罗拘陀。而在草原上，可萨人崭露头角；在斯堪的纳维亚，一股搅动世界的力量还未成熟……

original: This character has mastered the art of fighting during winter and knows how to turn the fierce elements into an advantage.
translation: 这个角色精通了冬季作战的要素，能灵活运用严寒。

original: Vassal Limit. Going over the limit will have a negative effect on the amount of taxes and levies you get from your vassals, and you might lose the grip of your vassals upon death. Remedy this by giving your vassals higher tier titles to allow them to have vassals on their own. Hover over the number to see where the limit is coming from.
translation: 封臣上限。超过上限会对你的封臣税收和征召兵造成负面影响，并且在死亡后你可能会失去你的封臣的控制权。 通过给予你的封臣更高等级的头衔来解决这个问题，让他们自己拥有封臣。将鼠标悬停在数字上以查看上限来自哪里。

original: If we for example want to make a character to like us a bit more, we can grant them an honorary title. Click the 'award honorary title' button. The Court Jester title is not very nice to give someone if you want to stay on their good side. Click Keeper of the Swans instead.
translation: 如果我们需要让他人变得更喜欢我们一点，我们可以给予他们荣誉称号。点击「授予荣誉称号」选项，先给个建议，如果你希望获得一个善意的回应，宫廷小丑并不是一个合适的选择。可改为天鹅饲养员。

original: You have the organization bar, the disband unit button and the split (create new unit) button. Then you have information on the number of ships, and towards the bottom we have the load capacity. This is how many troops will fit on the ships in this fleet. Unfortunately this number is a smaller number than the number of men in your current army, so select the army again.
translation: 在上部，你可以看到解散和建立新船队的选项。然后你可以看到舰队里有多少艘船，在底部你可以看到其运输能力。这些将决定你的舰队可以运输多少部队。很遗憾目前的舰队只能运输300人，这低于你的军队数量，所以重新选择你的部队。

A simple earthen hillfort will provide limited defence against our enemies.
translation: 一个简单的土夯城寨只能提供少许防卫。

original: With wooden palisades our hillfort will provide even more defence.
translation: 有了木围墙，土夯城寨能有更多防护。

original: Reinforcing our wooden palisades with stone will strengthen the fort.
translation: 用石料增强木墙能进一步保护城寨。

original: With the use of stone walls our hillfort will stand strong.
translation: 用石墙，城寨便能久攻不破。

original: Establishing a permanent village in our settlement is essential in order to improve our trade.
translation: 建立永久性的村落是贸易进步的根本。

original: Further expanding the village to a town will allow even more inhabitants to settle down to improve our trade.
translation: 进一步扩展村落到小镇，收容更多人口能加强贸易。

original: With some coin, the town will grow into a city with many traders and will improve our trade.
translation: 花费在建设上，能让小镇成长为城市，吸引更多商人。

original: The city will grow large and hold many trade posts, as any trade centre ought to.
translation: 城市会扩展更大，拥有贸易中心所必须的许多贸易站点。

This is where weapons are made, repaired and stored in preparation for war.
translation: 武器在这里被铸造，维护和储藏，以备战事。

original: Our militia assembles here to train and arm themselves.
translation: 我们的民兵在这里集结训练。

original: This is where our strong men muster to join our army in times of war.

Muslims can use this Casus Belli to usurp titles from their decadent dynasty members.
translation: 穆斯林可以用这个宣战理由篡夺腐化的同族头衔。

original: Tribal Organization is the counterpart to the feudal Crown Authority laws. However, even highly organized tribes have low control over their vassals.
translation: 部落组织法正如封建王权法。只不过即便组织良好的部落仍然缺乏对封臣的控制。

original: With low organization chiefs have barely any control over their vassals.
translation: 低组织度时，部落对封臣几乎没有任何控制。

original: Chiefs have limited power over their vassals.
translation: 酋长对封臣有少许控制。

original: The power of vassals and liege chiefs are somewhat balanced.
translation: 封臣与酋长的权利大致平衡。

original: Chiefs are gaining in power over their vassals.
Chiefs have control over their vassals, with laws similar to that of feudal lords.
translation: 酋长通过类似封建的方式控制着封臣。

original: Found Merchant Republic
Hold 3 duchy titles\n
Hold 3 kingdom titles\n

For too long you have restricted our rights. The time has come to decrease the level of Tribal Organization - you must submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences! Rest assured that I have the support of others who are equally determined to see things returned to the natural order...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
长久以来，你被限制着自由与自古以来享有的权利。现在是时候降低部落组织了。你必须和平接受，否则将自食其果！放心，我有许多拥有同样想法的人支持我，认为我们应该恢复自然秩序……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

Have [Root.GetTitledFirstName] judged by Zun

By having [Root.GetTitledFirstName] thrown into a pit in the middle of the desert, [Root.GetSheHe] shall be exposed to Zun for days and will be most likely given the 'justice' that [Root.GetSheHe] deserves.
translation: 在沙漠中找个深坑把[Root.GetTitledFirstName]扔进去，[Root.GetSheHe]将会在尊日神之下暴露数天，应该能给[Root.GetSheHe]应得的「正义」。

original: The guards visited me today, they merely tossed down a rope I hope I have the strength to climb.
translation: 守卫今天来见我，他们就扔了条绳子给我，我希望有足够力气爬上去。

original: Oh sweet freedom!
The rays from the sun dig into my skin, it cracks and bleeds and I feel myself slipping away almost as if floating out of this pit.
translation: 太阳的光辉刺入我破裂流血的皮肤，我感觉我好像飘在坑顶一般。

original: Is this how I die?
Who's there, who are you? I can hear you but can't touch you? P-Please help me I can hear you just outside the pit please i'm begging you.!
translation: 谁在哪，是谁？我听得到却摸不着你？求，求求你了，我能听到你在坑外，求求你了！

original: Was that a person leaning over the edge, or a figment of my imagination!
translation: 那是有人站在边缘，还是说是我的想象？

original: As I lie in the pit hoping for salvation yet another day I realize that none will come. Has I been forsaken? No that can't be it! I must keep believing, its the only thing I have left.
translation: 某天我躺在坑中，渴望救赎，我突然明白没人会来。我被遗弃了吗？不，不可能！信仰是我唯一剩下的东西，我得保持希望。

original: I will prove myself worthy to be [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s servant.
translation: 我将会证明我有资格成为[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的仆人。

original: On my back, staring up at the sun beating down upon me. This pit is torture, the heat scratches my skin like a thousand tiny blades I hope for salvation, I hope for freedom, I hope that my captors will release me but deep down I'm starting to realise...
translation: 哦，我的背，顶着太阳挺直吧。这坑是一场折磨，炎热像数千刀片一般刮着我的皮肤。我渴望救赎和自由，我希望关押我的人能放我出去。但心底里我开始明白……

original: The only one that can release me from this torture, from the unbearable heat is my new overlord Zun!
translation: 我的新主人大尊，才能将我从凡世的痛苦煎熬中解救！

陛下，您的慷慨捐献定会为人所知。我和教士们都视您为朋友。放心，如果人间没有赏赐，您在天堂也会得到的。

original: Owes 300¤ to the Haruriyyah

Peace be upon you, most magnificent [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. As you may know, our order is in need of leaders, and, considering your debt to us, I would like to request that your able and noble son [FromFrom.GetFirstName] serve in our ranks. Naturally, this would disinherit him. Allah be with you,\n\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 愿平安常伴您，最伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。如您所知，我们组织需要领导者，而鉴于您的负债，我恳请您送您那高贵的儿子[FromFrom.GetFirstName]来我们这任事。当然，这会让他丧失继承权。安拉保佑您，\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: The Haruriyyah

A new order of Muslim warriors has been founded, claiming descent from the old Haruri traditions and swearing to protect Islam and combat infidels and polytheists of all kinds. It was a Haruri who killed the Caliph Ali with a poisoned sword since they saw him as corrupting Islam, and this new group now vows to show the same courage and detemination in fighting any enemies of the true faith. They call themselves simply 'The Haruriyyah'.
translation: 一个新的穆斯林教团成立了，他们自认为是沿袭最古老的哈鲁里传统，发誓保护穆斯林对抗不信者和各路多神教。哈鲁里正是用毒剑刺杀哈里发阿里之人，认为阿里是伊斯兰教的毒瘤。这个新晋组织宣誓要有着一样的勇气和信念对抗唯一信仰的敌人。他们自称为「哈鲁里耶派」。

original: I am sure we can make use of them.
translation: 我多半有用他们的地方。

original: Poisoned swords? Hmm...

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], of course we, the Haruriyyah, can lend you 300 gold. All that we ask in return is your future assistance in certain matters as they might arise. Salaam alaykum,\n\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 最正义的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，理所当然我们哈鲁里耶派可以贷给您300黄金。我们仅仅要求在未来您能在一些事情上给予帮助。祝您平安，\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order needs more castles in order to train recruits and generate a supporting income. I am willing to cancel your debt to us if you will simply allow us to build a castle in [FromFrom.GetName]. Peace be with you,\n\n[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我教团需要一座城堡训练新兵，供给花费。如果您同意我们在[FromFrom.GetName]建座城堡，我很乐意一笔勾销您的贷款。祝您平安，\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

original: The Haruriyyah have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 哈鲁里耶派在[Root.GetName]建了座城堡！

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Haruriyyah to fight the infidel! This will forever disinherit him and he will never disgrace the dynasty with his decadence.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，请求加入哈鲁里耶派以对抗不信者！这样他会永远失去继承权，而家族也不会再受到来自他的腐化的影响。

original:
Most wise [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order needs more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. It has come to my attention that there is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.
Peace be upon you,

[From.GetTitledName]
translation: 最智慧的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我教团需要一座城堡训练新兵，供给花费。我注意到您的领地内有处合适的土地，具体来说是在[FromFrom.GetName]。我愿意提供 100 黄金换取建造要塞的权力。\祝您平安，\n\n[From.GetTitledName]

People in [Root.GetName] claimed to have seen two suns at the same time.
translation: [Root.GetName]的人们声称天上一度有两个太阳。

original: A goat with three heads was born in [Root.GetName].
translation: 三个头的山羊出现在了[Root.GetName]。

original: Tens of thousands of crows birds invaded [Root.GetName] just before the harvest, causing much damage to the farmers's fields.
translation: 成千上万乌鸦在收获前席卷了[Root.GetName]，毁坏了许多农田。

original: An uncommonly great number of children were born this year in [Root.GetName].
translation: 这年在[Root.GetName]有异常多的孩子出生。

original: In [Root.GetName], the people celebrated the benevolent rule of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
A star fell from the sky in [Root.GetName], killing three cows.
translation: 天上有一颗星星掉落在[Root.GetName]，造成三头牛身亡。

original: On [GetDateText], [From.GetFirstName] lost [From.GetHerHis] titles, and it was decided to pass on the dynasty chronicles to [Root.GetTitledName].
translation: 在[GetDateText]，[From.GetFirstName]失去了[From.GetHerHis]头衔，家族编年史交给了[Root.GetTitledName]。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] was victorious in the battle of [Root.Location.GetName] against the army of [From.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], commanded by [From.GetTitledName].
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]在[Root.Location.GetName]同[From.GetTitledName]率领的[From.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]军队作战并赢得胜利。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] lost the battle of [Root.Location.GetName] against the army of [From.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], commanded by [From.GetTitledName].
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]在[Root.Location.GetName]作战对抗[From.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]由[From.GetTitledName]率领的军队，但失败了。

original: The army of [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledName], commanded by [Root.GetTitledName], was victorious in the battle of [Root.Location.GetName] against the armies of [From.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
translation: [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledName]由[Root.GetTitledName]率领的军队，赢得了在[Root.Location.GetName]对抗[From.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]军队的战斗。

original: The army of [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledName], commanded by [Root.GetTitledName], was defeated in the battle of [Root.Location.GetName] against the armies of [From.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
translation: [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledName]由[Root.GetTitledName]率领的军队，输了在[Root.Location.GetName]对抗[From.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]军队的战斗。

original: Mother is right.

Your mother comes to see you. 'My [Root.GetSonDaughter], I am worried. Your [From.GetJobTitle], [From.GetTitledFirstName], doesn't seem to have our best interests in mind when executing the tasks of [From.GetHerHis] office. I fear [From.GetSheHe] may become a danger to your rule in the long run.'
translation: 你母亲来见你。「我的[Root.GetSonDaughter]，我很担忧。你的[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetTitledFirstName]，在[From.GetHerHis]工作上不知道什么才符合我们的利益。我担心长此以往，[From.GetSheHe]会有害于你的统治。」

original: You are right, Mother. The [From.GetJobTitle] has to go.
translation: 母亲，你是对的。[From.GetJobTitle]必须下台。

original: I will not get rid of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
